Strings.Text: It's dusty... It has not \nbeen used for a long time...{scroll 2}
A freezer... It has not\nbeen used for a long time...{scroll 2}
\nAn oven...{clear 0}It's badly rusted and does\nnot seem to work...{scroll 2}
A gas cooking stove... The\ngas is not supplied...{scroll 2}
Dark blood sticks to it...\nWhat did they cook here?{scroll 2}
